channel.title: Direct windows virtual machine traffic trought tor
channel.description: Hello, i have my host, and i have a windows 7 virtual machine on it. I was wondering if it was possible to direct all Windows 7 traffic trought the whonix gatewey. I want to surf on internet with MY WINDOWS XP, but i want that all traffic of windows xp, and DNS, went first trought the whonix gatwey (tor). Is this scenario possible, or is it immagination?

item.title: Direct windows virtual machine traffic trought tor
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:

item.title: Direct windows virtual machine traffic trought tor

item.description:
Hello, i have my host, and i have a windows 7 virtual machine on it.
I was wondering if it was possible to direct all Windows 7 traffic trought the whonix gatewey.
I want to surf on internet with MY WINDOWS XP, but i want that all traffic of windows xp, and DNS, went first trought the whonix gatwey (tor).
Is this scenario possible, or is it immagination?
